Ability Notes:
Charisma Comeliness Modifier: +2
Charisma Loyalty Adjustment: +30
Charisma Reaction Adjustment: +30
Continuous Training: Gains d100/100 charisma, strength, dexterity, and constitution at 1st level, 2d10/100 additional at each subsequent level
Features/Skills
Paladin Features: Armor Proficiency (All); Bonus Attacks; Continuous Training; Cure Disease; Deadly Lancer; Detect Evil; Diehard; Discriminating; Divine Health; Divine Protection; Equestrian; Fast Ride; Fear Immunity; Fighting The Unskilled; Lance Expertise; Lay On Hands; Mace Expertise; Mental Resistance; Mount Knowledge; Mounted Combatant; Non-Materialist; Philanthropist; Protection From Evil; Quick Mount; Shield Proficiency (All); Special Mount; Summon Warhorse; Sword Expertise; Turn Undead
Feature Notes:
Discriminating: Must not associate w/non-good characters
Mount Knowledge: Knows basic worth of mounts
Non-Materialist: May own at most 10 magic items, including 1 armor suit and 1 shield
Philanthropist: Must donate 10% of income, plus 100% after expenses, to lawful good causes
Summon Warhorse: May call a warhorse w/enhanced features
Languages: Common; Hobgoblin; Orc; Treant
Skill Notes:
Intelligence Language Bonus: +3
Equestrian: -4% chance of being unsaddled or being injured when mount falls
Fast Ride: Can ride at +2" pace for 1 hr
Quick Mount: Can vault into saddle and ride in 1 seg
Special Mount: Can ride a pegasus, hippogriff, or griffin
Combat
Hit Points: 89 Armor Class: 2 Attacks Per Round: 2.5 THAC0 Melee/Ranged: 4/4 THAC10 Melee/Ranged: -6/-6
Armor: Plate Mail Shield: None Weapons: Composite Long Bow (+0 d6 R60'); Glaive (+0 d6); Unarmed (+0 d2)
Weapon Proficiency Count: 13 Weapon Proficiency: Composite Long Bow; Dart; Glaive; Guisarme-Voulge; Horseman's Flail; Light Crossbow; Morning Star; Partisan; Spetum; Two-Handed Sword; Unarmed; Voulge; Whip
Turn Undead:
Fiend: 13 Ghast: D Ghost: 7 Ghoul: D Lich: 10 Mummy: T Shadow: D Skeleton: D Spectre: T Vampire: 4 Wight: D Wraith: D Zombie: D
Combat Notes:
Bonus Attacks: +1.5 attacks/rd
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +9
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: -1
Deadly Lancer: +20 lance damage when mounted, +1 dismounted
Diehard: Remains conscious at negative HP
Fighting The Unskilled: 20 attacks/rd vs. creatures with w/HD less than 1d8
Lance Expertise: +4 attack with lance when mounted, or parry for foe -4 attack
Mace Expertise: +3 attack with choice of horseman's mace, flail, or military pick, or parry for foe -3 attack
Mounted Combatant: +1 attack from mount
Sword Expertise: +3 attack with choice of broad sword, long sword, or scimitar, or parry for foe -3 attack
Turn Undead: May turn for 3d4 rd or destroy undead creatures
Save: Breath: 4; Death: 3; Petrification: 4; Spell: 6; Wand: 5 Survive Resurrection: 94% Survive System Shock: 91%
Save Notes:
Divine Health: Immune to disease
Divine Protection: +2 all saves
Fear Immunity: R10' Immune to fear
Mental Resistance: 90% resistance to mental attacks, +2 vs. illusions
Magic
Spell Slots: C1: 3; C2: 3; C3: 3; C4: 3
Spells:
Bless (C1 Conj): R60' Unengaged allies in a 50' sq gain +1 attack and morale (Reverse inflicts -1 on foes) for 6 rd
Command (C1 Ench): R10' Target obeys a single-word command (Save neg for Intelligence 13+ or HD 6+)
Create Water (C1 Alte): R10' Creates (Reverse destroys) 80 gallons of potable water
Detect Charm (C2 Divi): Self discerns charmed state of 1 target/rd in a 30' radius for 1 tn (Reverse shields 1 target)
Detect Lie (C4 Divi): R30' Target discerns lies for 20 rd (Reverse makes lies believable)
Feign Death (C3 Necr): RTouch Willing target appears dead, takes half damage, and gains immunity to draining for 30 rd
Glyph Of Warding (C3 Abju): 500' sq inflicts 40 HP (Save half) when next touched w/out speaking the glyph name
Hold Person (C2 Ench): R60' Immobilizes 1-3 medium targets for 24 rd (Save neg)
Prayer (C3 Conj): R60' Gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves, and inflicts -1 on foes, for 20 rd
Protection From Evil 10' Radius (C4 Abju): 1
Spiritual Hammer (C2 Evoc): R30' Allows self to attack w/a magical force for conc up to 20 rd
Tongues (C4 Alte): R30' Allows self to converse in any language (Reverse muddles) for 1 tn
Magic Notes:
Cure Disease: May use Cure Disease effects 4/wk
Detect Evil: May use R60' Detect Evil effects at will
Lay On Hands: May use touch to heal 40 HP 1/dy
Protection From Evil: Has a continuous Protection From Evil, 10' Radius effect centered on self
